mapper.select: select m.id as id , m.file as file , m.name as name , m.price as price, m.create_at as createAt , m.update_at as updateAt , m.delete_at as deleteAt , m.delete_yn as delteYn from emoji_history h left join main_emoji m on m.id = h.main_emoji_id where h.u_id = #{userId} and cancel_yn = 'N' and confirm_yn = 'Y' order by m.id desc;
